description: Single storey detached garden outbuilding to be used as music room
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 20.152.OS (Existing Location Plan and Block Plan), 20.152.POS (Proposed Location Plan and Block Plan), 21.66.101 (Existing and Proposed Site Plan), 21.166.102 (Existing and Proposed East Elevation), 21.166.103 (Existing and Proposed West Elevation), 21.166.104 (Existing and Proposed South Elevation), 21.166.105 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan), 21.166.106 (Proposed Roof Plan), 21.166.107 (Proposed East Elevation), 21.166.108 (Proposed West Elevation), 21.166.109 (Proposed Section A-A), 21.166.110 (Proposed Section Front Elevations), Design and Access Statement.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with those described in the submitted application form and approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The outbuilding hereby permitted shall be used for domestic purposes ancillary to the enjoyment of the main dwellinghouse at 17 Clovelly Road, Ealing, London, W5 5HF only and not for any other use. No kitchen facilities shall be installed into the outbuilding at any time.

Reason: To prevent the creation of a separate self-contained residential unit of accommodation and in the interests of the living conditions of the existing and future residents of the site and to ensure that the use of the building does not, by reason of any other activity, harm the living conditions in the area, in accordance with policies 1.1,1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), SPG 4, and policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D4, D6 and D8 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| The acoustic insulation and materials outlined in the submitted Design and Access Statement shall be installed prior to the first use of the outbuilding.

Reason: To protect the residential amenity of neighbouring premises, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 2.1 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D6 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
